price: 86. Loba: Mapata sambo ezali ya nani, тре nani Nkolo ngwende ya monene?
arabic: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul man rabbu al-samāwāti al-sabʿi warabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
